name: MIDICIProfile
desc: A mapping of MIDI messages to specific sounds and synthesis behaviors, such as General MIDI, a drawbar organ, and so on.

items.name: init(data: Data)
items.desc: Creates a MIDI profile for the specified data.

items.name: init(data: Data, name: String)
items.desc: Creates a named MIDI profile for the specified data.

items.name: var name: String
items.desc: A string that describes the profile.

items.name: var profileID: Data
items.desc: The unique five-byte profile identifier that represents the profile.
